name: PINK (238)
description:
This is my first game, PINK. This game is 2D platformer and 8-bit?? lol. It has many stages and three mode is easy, hard and lunatic. The lunatic mode is displayed by clearing the others.

Have a try! And, I'd like some advice is improvements and so on.

Enjoy!! Screenshots

Music: 魔王魂(http://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/)
